error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.title: Biz member reviews and updates booking status API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Max download attempts per entitlement/purchase". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.
